content: **skill level** intermediate **finished measurements** width 40 depth 14 **gauge** gauge is not critical to this project however a different gauge will affect finished measurements and amount of yarn used approximately 5 row repeats in pattern stitch = 4 **yarn** yarn citizen harmony dk dk weight 50% wool 50% alpaca 230yds/100g 1 skein shown in mulberry **materials** hook us size g/7 4 5mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle scissors
